February 24, 2022
hoojeebo
I don't think it is a "biggie". First off, standard characters have to be KO'd, or she has to succeed at Leadership, in order to make Grave markers. THEN, she has to be given a Power action to generate the Draugr, which only come out of Grave markers, which is not guaranteed to be in a convenient spot for Hela to be adjacent to in order to have Mastermind fodder. That's a lot of work! I'm not sold.
February 22, 2022
gambitrmp
With exploit weakness that 1 damage may also crack a reducer & get rid of it. The mastermind comment is also a biggie. Anyone who can generate their own mastermind fodder is cool.
February 15, 2022
SLVRSR4
[QUOTE]The fact that these aren't Autonomous makes this Hela less exciting to me. I love bystander generators, but why would I want to spend precious actions on a bunch of guys that deal 1 damage?[/QUOTE] I certainly get that line of logic, but if you are down on characters and aren't USING those actions, it's nice to generate things that CAN use those actions. It's also nice to have other attackers (Even if they are only nickel and diming your opponent) that can attack or tie somebody up while your main attacker(s) might need to rest. More characters is never a bad thing (Especially when they're doing penetrating damage)
